text: jis din tum momin purushon aur momin striyon ko dekhoge ki unaka prakaash unake aage-aage daud raha hai aur unake daen haath mein hai. (kaha jaega,) "aaj shubh soochana hai tumhaare lie aisee jannaton kee jinake neeche naharen bah rahee hai, jinamen sadaiv rahana hai. vahee badee saphalata hai.
